languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Авангард{/g} и его союзники в радиусе 3 клеток получают +<u>(3 + число уровней эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}")</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Эти союзники получают на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от следующей атаки. Эффект действует до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} авангарда.

traits.locale_text:
The Vanguard and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>3+(number of unyielding beacon stacks)</u> temporary wounds.
All affected allies suffer -50% less damage from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.

The Vanguard and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of unyielding beacon stacks)</u> temporary wounds.
All affected allies gain -50% less damage from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.

All affected allies gain -50% less damage from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.

Авангард и его союзники в радиусе 3 клеток получают +<u>(3 + число уровней знака стойкости)</u> временного здоровья.
Эти союзники получают на 50% меньше урона от следующей атаки. Эффект действует до начала следующего хода авангарда.

Авангард и его союзники в радиусе 3 клеток получают +<u>(3 + число уровней знака стойкости)</u> временного здоровья.
Эти союзники получают на 50% меньше урона от следующей атаки. Эффект действует до начала следующего хода авангарда.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}与3格内所有盟友获得+<u>（3+{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}层数）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
所有受影响的盟友下次受到的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。此效果持续到先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
先锋与3格内所有盟友获得+<u>（3+{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}层数）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
所有受影响的盟友下次受到的攻击伤害降低50%。此效果持续到先锋的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} y todos los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas a su alrededor ganan +<u>(3 + cantidad de acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
Todos los aliados afectados reciben un −50 % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del próximo ataque. Este efecto dura hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El vanguardia y todos los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas a su alrededor ganan +<u>(3 + cantidad de acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
Todos los aliados afectados reciben un -50 % menos de daño del próximo ataque. Este efecto dura hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia.

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} und alle Verbündeten in eines Radius von 3 Feldern erhalten +<u>(3 + Zahl der Stapel von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
Alle betroffenen Ziele erleiden beim nächsten Angriff −50 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Der Effekt dauert bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} der Vorhut an.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die Vorhut und sämtliche Verbündeten innerhalb eines Radius von 3 Zellen um die Vorhut erlangen +<u>(3 + Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}-Stapeln)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
Alle betroffenen Verbündeten erleiden beim nächsten Angriff -50 % weniger Schaden. Der Effekt hat bis zum Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} der Vorhut Bestand.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} et tous les alliés situés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui bénéficient de +<u>(3 + nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide inflexible{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
Toutes les cibles affectées subissent 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins lors de l'attaque suivante. L'effet dure jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du patrouilleur.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le Patrouilleur et tous les alliés situés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui bénéficient de +<u>(3 + nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
Tous les alliés affectés bénéficient de 50 % de dégâts en moins lors de l'attaque suivante. L'effet dure jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Patrouilleur.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}とその周囲3セル以内のすべての味方は、+<u>(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
効果を受けたすべての敵は、次の攻撃での被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が-50%される。この効果は、ヴァンガードの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで持続する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
ヴァンガードとその周囲3セル以内のすべての味方は、+<u>(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
効果を受けたすべての味方は、次の攻撃での被ダメージが-50%される。この効果は、ヴァンガードの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで持続する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g} ve etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimleri, +<u>(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}yılmaz fener{/g} birikimi sayısı)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} kazanırlar.
Etkilenen tüm hedefler, bir sonraki saldırıdan %50 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar. Etki, Öncü'nün bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında sona erer.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} and all their allies in a 3-cell radius around them gain +<u>(3 + number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
All affected targets suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack. The effect lasts until the start of the Vanguard's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
